animals.name: African Elephant
animals.habitat: Savannas, forests, and grasslands of Sub-Saharan Africa
animals.importantNote: Largest land animal on Earth; highly intelligent and social.

animals.name: Bald Eagle
animals.habitat: Near lakes, rivers, and coastal regions in North America
animals.importantNote: Symbol of the United States; known for its excellent eyesight and powerful flight.

animals.name: Green Sea Turtle
animals.habitat: Tropical and subtropical oceans, often near coral reefs
animals.importantNote: Long-distance migrator; endangered due to plastic pollution and poaching.

animals.name: Arctic Fox
animals.habitat: Arctic tundra regions of the Northern Hemisphere
animals.importantNote: Has thick fur that changes color with the seasons (white in winter, brown in summer) for camouflage.

animals.name: Poison Dart Frog
animals.habitat: Tropical rainforests of Central and South America
animals.importantNote: Brightly colored as a warning; some species have skin toxins strong enough to deter predators or harm humans.
